Description: MUST have an equalized MER of 50dB
Rules for testing:
DS MER (equalized) >= 48dB  
Perform on all 4 DS ports.
Perform at temperatures -30C, 25C, and 65C. (didn't list -40C since the module won't be in a node)
Requires VSA/Spectrum Analyzer w/VSA software. May want to test with different tilt settings.
Downstream SC-QAM Modulation order 256-QAM. Also test with 4096-QAM modulation order.
